description: The Customers_and_Loan dataset provides comprehensive information about individuals applying for loans, including their demographic and financial details. This dataset is particularly useful for financial institutions and researchers interested in analyzing loan approval processes, customer demographics, and financial behaviors. It includes key attributes such as customer ID, loan status, date of birth, age, monthly income, and state of residence. Additionally, it provides financial metrics like interest rates, FICO scores, and loan amounts requested. The dataset also includes information on loan purposes and home ownership status, which can be crucial for understanding customer profiles and risk assessment. The inclusion of FICO score ranges and their maximum and minimum values allows for detailed creditworthiness analysis. This dataset can be used for predictive modeling, risk assessment, and customer segmentation, making it a valuable resource for developing strategies to improve loan approval rates and manage financial risk effectively.
shortDesc: Customer loan dataset with demographics and financial details.

columns.name: id
columns.comment: Unique customer identifier, bigint, key for records.

columns.name: Status
columns.comment: Loan application status, string, indicates approval.

columns.name: Date_Of_Birth_parsed
columns.comment: Customer's birth date, date, for age calculation.

columns.name: Age
columns.comment: Customer's age in years, bigint, demographic info.

columns.name: Monthly_Income
columns.comment: Customer's monthly income, double, financial status.

columns.name: State
columns.comment: Customer's US state, string, geographic location.

columns.name: Interest_Rate
columns.comment: Loan interest rate, double, cost of borrowing.

columns.name: FICO_Range
columns.comment: Customer's FICO score range, string, credit rating.

columns.name: Default
columns.comment: Loan default indicator, double, risk assessment.

columns.name: Amount_Requested
columns.comment: Loan amount requested, bigint, financial need.

columns.name: Loan_Purpose
columns.comment: Purpose of loan, string, reason for borrowing.

columns.name: Loan_Length
columns.comment: Loan term length in months, string, repayment period.

columns.name: Home_Ownership
columns.comment: Customer's home ownership status, string, asset info.
